title: 如何生成抛出去的箭
txt_content:
本帖最后由 2677513295 于 2020-4-8 17:22 编辑 

如何做到生成朝着视线方向抛出去的箭或者雪球？ 版本1.14

replies.author: (=°ω°)丿
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 (=°ω°)丿 于 2020-4-14 15:32 编辑 
forceload add 0 0
summon armor_stand 0.0 0.0 0.0 {Tags:["marker"],Rotation:[0.0f,0.0f],Invisible:true,Marker:true}
execute as @p at @s anchored eyes run summon arrow ^ ^ ^ {Motion:[0.0d,0.0d,0.0d],NoGravity:1b,damage:3.0,Tags:["arrow"]}
execute as @e[tag=marker] at @s rotated as @p run tp ^ ^ ^10
execute as @e[tag=arrow] run data modify entity @s Motion set from entity @e[tag=marker,limit=1] Pos
kill @e[tag=marker]
forceload remove 0 0复制代码

replies.author: PTSD∝龌龊闵
replies.txt_content:
解决了
https://www.mcmod.cn/tools/cbcreator/#/entity/
实体选择飞行中的箭
记得开F3以找到X,Y,Z的正负极
你输入
/summon minecraft:arrow ~ ~5 ~ {Motion:[5.0,0.0,0.0]}
你会看到（记得开F5切第三人称）
生成的箭会往X方向以每游戏刻位移的格数
相当于射出的箭
